alertDescription.value: the number of unavailable replicas as a % of Total

query.value: InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_gauge('kube_deployment_status_replicas_available') | extend deployment = tostring(Labels.deployment) | extend namespace = tostring(Labels.namespace) | extend Available = Val | join kind=inner ( InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_gauge('kube_deployment_status_replicas') | extend deployment = tostring(Labels.deployment) | extend namespace = tostring(Labels.namespace) | extend Total = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, deployment, namespace | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, Available, Total, Pct = percentage(Available, Total), deployment, namespace
